title: Comparison Function
description: CMP compares two REAL values if the frst N points are equal.
name: CMP

input.name: X
input.description: The first real number to be compared.

input.name: Y
input.description: The second real number to be compared.

input.name: N
input.description: An integer that determines the precision for the comparison.

output.name: CMP
output.description: The result of the comparison; TRUE if the absolute difference between X and Y is less than the computed threshold, FALSE otherwise.

return_value.description: The Boolean result indicating if X and Y are considered equal within the defined precision.
